#summary How to build x86 NaCl

== Building on Linux ==
 * Check out the Native Client source using gclient
 * `sudo apt-get install g++-multilib libsdl1.2-dev texinfo libcrypto++-dev libssl-dev lib32ncurses5-dev` # For Ubuntu Lucid.
 * For Ubuntu Lucid x86_64 it is necessary to *uninstall* `libmpfr-dev` because it does not contain the 32bit version of the library needed by the toolchain
 * [http://www.chromium.org/nativeclient/how-tos/building-and-testing-gcc-and-gnu-binutils Build the x86 toolchain]
